## ğŸ“ Summary
Briefly describe the feature or improvement you want to implement.  
Example: Add a feature that automatically analyzes IDA script output and exports it as JSON.

---

## ğŸ¯ Motivation
Explain why this feature is needed and what problem it solves.  
Example: To reduce repetitive manual analysis tasks and enable automated report generation.

---

## ğŸ§© Implementation
List the functions, classes, modules, or main logic required for implementation.  
Using a checklist format is recommended.

- [ ] `parse_dump_data()`: Function to parse dumped data  
- [ ] `convert_to_format()`: Function to convert data into multiple formats (JSON, XML, etc.)  
- [ ] `DataParser` class: Handles common parsing logic  
- [ ] Add unit tests (`test_data_parser.py`)  
- [ ] Update documentation (`README.md`)
